AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: psychically gifted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a greater awareness of the unseen. After many years of mentoring by some of the highest ranking snake priests, [PAWN_pronoun] learnt how to harness [PAWN_possessive] gift, and hear the voices of the serpents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: snake tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Every aspiring sea serpent tamer had to start somewhere, and for [PAWN_nameDef], that was taming plain old snakes. [PAWN_pronoun] struggled at first, and may have been bitten a few times, but eventually [PAWN_nameDef] got the hang of handling them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: crab herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: The Isles of Pyandonea were home to many crab farms, and [PAWN_nameDef] assisted at one of them. The crabs found there weren't particularly intelligent, as one would expect, but always seemed to find holes in the pen. [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days chasing escaped crabs, and mending broken fences.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bug collector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had quite the exquisite collection of bugs, all found natively in Pyandonea. While Pyandonea was home to many colourful arthropods, there were far too many for [PAWN_objective] to collect, but that never stopped [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scallop digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to earn a bit of coin digging for scallops. Days were long and tiring, likely because [PAWN_nameDef] spent quite a considerable amount of time digging in the wrong places.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant cook
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance to some highly skilled cooks. While [PAWN_pronoun] learnt quite a few things, [PAWN_nameDef] didn't make it very far, as [PAWN_pronoun] really doesn't like plants.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant shipwright
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance to the local shipwrights. [PAWN_nameDef] knew all the commonly used tools by heart, and eventually started handing them to the shipwrights before [PAWN_pronoun] was even asked to fetch it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: assistant smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance a rather skilled blacksmith Admittedly, [PAWN_nameDef] spent a substantial amount of time bandaging wounds, as [PAWN_nameDef] didn't quite seem to understand touching hot things was a bad idea.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: healers assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] provided assistance to one of the healers at the local temple. From preparing poultices to brewing elixirs, [PAWN_nameDef] could attempt it, but not necessarily succeed at it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: pirate child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was practically born into the pirate life, and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] early years at sea. [PAWN_pronoun] picked up some useful skills, though most were focused on the best places to stab opponents.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: kelp harvester
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made sure to always help during the kelp harvests. Admittedly, [PAWN_nameDef] just wanted to catch a glimpse of a sea serpent, maybe even touch one. Sadly, [PAWN_pronoun] never did.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: coral enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always fascinated by coral, especially all the different shapes and colours it came in. [PAWN_nameDef] even spent most of [PAWN_possessive] spare time reading about all the different species of coral that grows elsewhere.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: embassy assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was dragged to one of the many Maormer embassies by [PAWN_pronoun] parents, so it was only natural that [PAWN_pronoun] wound up as an assistant. Most days were spent organising scrolls and wardening guests, though ocassionally something exciting happened.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: temple assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted at the local temple. This usually involved sweeping the floor, and ensuring candles were in good condition. But sometimes [PAWN_nameDef] would be tasked with organising the library, or leading guests around.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: merchants assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted one of the many local merchants. Days were spent hauling crates of various goods around, reparing said crates when [PAWN_pronoun] dropped them, and occasionally working the counter.
